sentences.cn: 新近获得行医许可的医生
有专业资格的社会工作者

sentences.en: Cameroon have also qualified after beating Sierra Leone.
sentences.cn: 喀麦隆队击败塞拉利昂队之后也成功晋级.

sentences.en: Even as a humanitarian mission it has been only a qualified success.
sentences.cn: 即便是作为一次人道主义行动，它也不过是取得了有限的成功。

sentences.en: He is qualified to do [ for doing ] the work.
sentences.cn: 他做这种工作很 相宜.

sentences.en: He qualified his coffee with cognac.
sentences.cn: 他在咖啡里加白兰地改变其香味.

sentences.en: His proposal was qualified as practical.
sentences.cn: 他的建议被认为是可行的.

sentences.en: In Belgium only qualified doctors may practise alternative medicine.
sentences.cn: 在比利时只有资质合格的医生才能从事非传统医学工作。

sentences.en: Jane is well qualified for this teaching job.
sentences.cn: 简很适合担任这份教职.

sentences.en: Mr Wade answers both questions with a qualified yes.
sentences.cn: 韦德先生对两个问题给出了不完全肯定的回答。

sentences.en: The General is ideally qualified for the job.
sentences.cn: 这位将军最适合做这项工作。

sentences.en: There are problems in recruiting suitably qualified scientific officers for NHS laboratories.
sentences.cn: 很难为国民医疗保健系统的实验室招募到资历合适的高级科研人员。

sentences.en: There will soon be a shortfall in supply of qualified young people.
sentences.cn: 合格年轻人才的短缺将很快出现.

sentences.en: They are best qualified to speak on this question.
sentences.cn: 他们对这个问题最有发言权.

sentences.en: We all account him a qualified teacher.
sentences.cn: 我们都认为他是一名合格的教师.

sentences.en: We must note that we still lack qualified specialists.
sentences.cn: 我们必须看到我们还缺乏有资质的专家.

sentences.en: You are one of us, and you are qualified to be a member of this Republic.
sentences.cn: 你是我们中的一员，你有资格成为这个共和国中的一份子。

words.tran_cn: 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格
限定词，[语] 限定语；取得资格的人；修饰语
限制；使具有资格；证明…合格
限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予

phrases.tran_cn: 虽然具备，有担任…的资格
合格的候选人；合资格人员
合格人士；有资格的人员

trans.tran_cn: 有资格的，具备…的学历/资历，有条件的
trans.tran_en: having suitable knowledge, experience, or skills, especially for a particular job

trans.tran_cn: 限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予
